LanguageData.RS_BigSimpleRawMeatBall.label: Big simple raw meatball
LanguageData.RS_BigSimpleRawMeatBall.description: A large ball of raw meat. Rakkle's favourite food.
LanguageData.RS_BigLavishRawMeatBall.label: Big lavish raw meatball
LanguageData.RS_BigLavishRawMeatBall.description: A large ball of raw meat. All poor quality parts were removed creating and exceptionally tasty gourmet meat ball. Rakkle's LOVE these.
